snippet: It will be four years on Tuesday since the last fatal crash in the United States, a record unmatched since propeller planes gave way to the jet.
abstract: Flying on a commercial jetliner has never been safer; it is four years since the last fatal crash in the United States, a record unmatched since propeller planes gave way to the jet age more than half a century ago.

byline.original: By JAD MOUAWAD and CHRISTOPHER DREW

lead_paragraph: It will be four years on Tuesday since the last fatal crash in the United States, a record unmatched since propeller planes gave way to the jet.

headline.seo: 2012 Was the Safest Year for Airlines Globally Since 1945
headline.main: Airline Industry at Its Safest Since the Dawn of the Jet Age
headline.print_headline: Airline Industry at Its Safest Since the Dawn of the Jet Age
